description: Configure Pub sub using the following options

scope.description: Set this to the scope you wish to use for pub sub. Defaults to the application id.

topicName.description: Set this to the topic name you want the error event to go to for pub sub. Defaults to 'poison-queue'

enabled.description: Enable pushing failing events after their max retries to a poison queue topic to manually process them

provider.description: Set this to the pub sub backend you wish to use. Supports inmemory and kafka. Defaults to inmemory.

kafka.description: Configures the kafka pub sub backend.

brokers.description: The list of kafka brokers to connect to.

inmemory.description: Configures the inmemory pub sub backend.

topicRetry.description: Enable the retry mechanism with pubsub topic

enableAutoCommit.description: Enable auto-commit logic on records polling
